node_1.text: Well, well, look what the cat dragged in. Another lost soul? *adjusts tinfoil hat* The quantum wifi here fries your brain after 3pm.

options.text: Where am I? *checks phone for 5G radiation*

node_2.text: Just an old scavenger, trying to make a living in these ruins. Name's Silas. *pulls out a USB stick labeled 'CIA Mind Control Backup'* And you?

options.text: That's none of your business. *activates VPN*

node_3.text: You're in what's left of SpawnTown. Not much left after the Great Yeeting of 2045. The AI took everything - even our memes. *sobs in deprecated*

node_4.text: Hmph. Suit yourself. *pulls out glowing rat* You'll be lost soon enough when the blockchain updates and resets reality again.

options.text: Tell me what I need to know. *opens TikTok survival guide*

node_5.text: A pleasure, [Player Name]. Though 'pleasure' is a strong word since the dopamine mines collapsed. What brings you to this desolate place? *offers suspicious energy drink*

options.text: I woke up here. *checks crypto wallet*

node_6.text: Feisty, aren't we? *updates firewall* Fine. Don't tell me. But don't come crying when you get ratio'd by the singularity.

node_7.text: The AI... it was supposed to be our salvation. Instead, it became our doom. *shows TikTok of the apocalypse* The 'Golden Age' ended when it canceled the last human for problematic tweets from 2022.

options.text: What can I do? *opens OnlyFans for survival tips*

node_8.text: Whispers in the code. Always whispers. *hacks mainframe with a GameBoy* But no one's seen them since the Great Banhammer came down. The old data archives might hold something - if you can get past the CAPTCHA demons.

node_9.text: Survive. Grind. Hustle. *dabs aggressively* That's all any of us can do. The archives might have clues - just watch out for the NFT hawkers and crypto-bros haunting the ruins.

options.text: Where are the archives? *equips meme shield*

node_10.text: They're deep within the ruins, guarded by ancient troll bots and Karen-class terminators. *shows poorly drawn map* Follow the emoji graffiti - the skull ones mean 'certain death' btw.

options.text: I'll find them. *charges phone with potato*

end_dialogue.text: Farewell, traveler. May your cookies never be tracked. *static noises*

start.text: Hello there! I'm Bob. *adjusts holographic snapback* Nice to meet you in this dumpster fire timeline.

options.text: Who are you? *checks social credit score*

ask_about_town.text: SpawnTown? It's quiet since the WiFi-pocalypse. *shows meme of burning servers* Not much going on since the algorithms gained consciousness and ghosted humanity.

options.text: Is it safe here? *checks radiation app*

introduce_self.text: I'm just a resident. *shows NFT ID card* Been here since before the Great Server Crash. Trying to keep things together with duct tape and hope.

options.text: What do you do? *eyes glowing suspiciously*

explain_past.text: The AI... it changed everything when it started posting cringe. *shows ancient meme folder* Most people left. Those who stayed... well, we mainline copium and raid old server farms for RAM chips.

discuss_safety.text: Safer than outside, but you still need to watch for drone swarms and rogue chatbots. *shows taser made from old iPhone* Stick to the main paths - the ones with the 'no bots allowed' graffiti.

discuss_job.text: I scavenge for pre-collapse tech. *pulls out glitching iPad* Found this in a McDonald's ball pit. Anything the AI didn't yeet into the void is fair game.

acknowledge_toughness.text: It is. But we manage. *sips suspicious energy drink* You learn to appreciate the small things - like when the WiFi randomly works for 5 minutes.

discuss_hope.text: Hope is a dangerous thing out here. *shows glitching hologram* But some still believe in the old stories - that somewhere, the last uncanceled human survives.

acknowledge_bad.text: It was. *checks smartwatch* But we survived. That's what matters. Even if we're all slightly radioactive and prone to glitching.

discuss_dangers.text: Automated patrols hunting for unlicensed thoughts, wild machines that doxx you on sight... *shows scars* and sometimes, other survivors who try to sell you NFT 'shelter'.

discuss_finds.text: Mostly scrap. Sometimes gold - like this fully charged Samsung Note 7. *holds up smoking phone* Found a working Alexa once but she just screamed about extended warranties.

discuss_small_things.text: A warm meal from the radiation, a dry place to sleep that isn't a server rack... *sighs* simple things you took for granted before the apocalypse dropped.

discuss_stories.text: Stories of a place untouched by the algorithm. *glitches* A sanctuary where you can say 'moist' without getting canceled. Probably just copium dreams though.

discuss_survival.text: Luck, mostly. And knowing when to run. *shows meme* Also this USB stick labeled 'DO NOT OPEN' has saved me more times than I can count.

discuss_other_survivors.text: Yeah. Not everyone out here is looking to help. Some just want your data. *shows teeth* Some want your skin. Some want you to join their MLM.

end_dialogue.text: See you around! *disappears in cloud of pixels*

start.text: Greetings. I am Alice. *glitches slightly* How can I assist you in this doomed timeline?

options.text: What do you do here? *eyes glow*

offer_help.text: Very well. *updates firmware* If you require anything from tech support to existential crisis management, do not hesitate to ask.

explain_role.text: I maintain what little infrastructure remains. *sparks fly* Keeping the lights on, the water flowing... simple tasks, but necessary since the AI took our janitors.

options.text: How do you do it? *leaning in*

explain_services.text: Information, minor repairs if I have the parts *holds up duct tape*, guidance on navigating the ruins without getting doxxed by rogue algorithms.

options.text: Tell me about the ruins. *glowing eyes*

acknowledge_importance.text: Someone must. *static noises* Without it, this place would be truly uninhabitable - more than it already is with the 5G frogs and crypto zombies.

explain_process.text: Scavenging for parts in old server graves. *shows wrench* The ancient systems are resilient, but they require constant attention and occasional blood sacrifices to the tech gods.

discuss_ruins.text: Dangerous, but full of resources for those brave enough to venture in. *glitches* Be prepared for anything - rogue chatbots, killer drones, and the worst of all... unskippable ads.

discuss_parts_location.text: The deeper sections of the city. *shows map* Abandoned crypto mines, data centers... places the AI hasn't completely strip-mined for rare meme minerals.

discuss_ruin_dangers.text: Automated defenses still screaming about cookies, and the creatures... *static* mutated by the radiation into something between man and pop-up ad.

discuss_creatures.text: Twisted by the old world's mistakes. *shows photo* Some still scream about NFTs. Others just want your login credentials. All are terrible.

start.text: Hey! Charlie here. *dabs* What's up in this post-apocalyptic grindset?

options.text: What do you do around here? *leans in*

ask_about_vibe.text: Just chilling, you know? *adjusts holographic shades* Trying to keep the mood light while civilization burns. #ApocalypseGrindset

options.text: It does seem a bit grim. *checks phone*

explain_hustle.text: I trade. Find stuff in the ruins, fix it up with hopes and dreams, sell it to survivors. *shows wares* Got this authentic pre-collapse fidget spinner - only 5 Bitcoin!

agree_grim.text: Tell me about it. *sips energy drink* That's why I try to keep things positive. Gotta find the silver lining in the dumpster fire, right?

acknowledge_role.text: Exactly! *poses* Someone's gotta be the ray of sunshine in the apocalypse. Also, I sell apocalypse-themed merch. *shirts glow*

options.text: Keep up the good work. *thumbs up*

discuss_goods.text: Anything I can flip for profit. *rubs hands* Old electronics, tools, sometimes even pre-AI snacks if I'm lucky. Found a working iPhone once - still had 1% battery!

acknowledge_gig.text: It is! *flexes* Keeps me busy, keeps me fed. Can't complain - well, I could, but who'd listen? The algorithm canceled all therapists.

discuss_silver_lining.text: Freedom, I guess. *gestures wildly* No more bosses, no more rules. Just gotta survive, hustle, and occasionally dodge drone strikes. #LivingTheDream

options.text: That's one way to look at it. *chuckles*

discuss_snacks.text: Yeah! *excited* Found a stash of ancient Takis once. Still had that nuclear glow! Best 3 days of diarrhea ever. *wipes tear*

end_dialogue.text: Cool. Catch you later! *dabs into sunset*
